Class VocableTrainerPanel.ImageClick

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerPanel.ImageClick

    Enclosing class:
    VocableTrainerPanel

    private class VocableTrainerPanel.ImageClick
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Inner class to handle mouse click events on images.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageClick

        public ImageClick(int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  int panelIndex)
        Constructs an ImageClick listener with specified bounds and target panel index.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the clickable area
        y - the y-coordinate of the clickable area
        width - the width of the clickable area
        height - the height of the clickable area
        panelIndex - the index of the panel to switch to upon click
